title: What are the NEET 2020 marks to get into AIIMS Raipur? - Quora
tags: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS)

response.answer_text: Considering previous year trends,one would have to score at least 1000 or less rank in NEET-UG 2020 to secure a seat in AIIMS Raipur.Regarding number of marks that need to be scored ,it will largely depend on the overall performance of the students appearing in the exam(say around 640 if the level of difficulty remains same as that of this year's paper).Just to give you a rough idea:  Regards.Upvote if helpful.Ayush.
You should target to get atleast 620–630 marks in NEET 2020 in order to get a seat in Aiims Raipur.
